meanings.definition: characteristic of or resembling a nerd
meanings.sent1: She wore a pair of glasses that gave her a nerdish look.
meanings.sent2: The nerdish student always had the latest technology gadgets.
meanings.sent3: His nerdish outfit made everyone laugh at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The nerdish atmosphere of the comic book store was inviting.
meanings.sent5: The nerdish hairstyle with the side part was quite popular.

meanings.definition: a person who is overly intellectual or interested in obscure topics
meanings.sent1: The nerdish spent hours discussing quantum physics.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the nerdish of the group due to her vast knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The nerdish surprised everyone with his extensive trivia knowledge.
meanings.sent4: In the library, he was a nerdish, always buried in books.
meanings.sent5: The nerdish was the go-to person for solving complex puzzles.
